description:
Bruce M. Plaxen founded the law firm of Plaxen & Adler, P.A., nearly 30 years ago. Since our law firm's founding, we have earned a reputation as one of the top personal injury firms in Maryland. Today, we proudly serve the state's victims from nine office locations, including the one in Dundalk. You can turn to the attorneys at our firm for help if you need assistance with any of the following:

  • Auto accidents involving cars, trucks or motorcycles
  • Claims or appeals related to workers’ compensation
  • Dog bites
  • Fungal meningitis from contaminated injections
  • Medical malpractice, stemming from hospital negligence, birth injuries or surgical errors
  • Product and premises liability claims
  • Social Security Disability initial filings and denial disputes
  • Wrongful death claims

Our law firm's attorneys, who have more than 60 years of combined legal experience, are not afraid of a challenge. They are willing to take on cases big or small, simple or complex. In each case, we strive to reach a settlement, but we are not afraid to take our cases to court when necessary. Our firm's attorneys have won two of the biggest court verdicts in Howard and Montgomery counties, one for a slip and fall and one for a birth injury.

If you are suffering due to someone else's negligent act, you can turn to the lawyers at Plaxen & Adler, P.A., for the help you need. If you would like to find out more about how our law firm can help you, you can schedule a free initial consultation. If you need to meet in the evening or on a weekend, we will be more than happy to accommodate your schedule. If you are unable to travel, we will come to you.
